definitions.definition: A place where things join , a junction .

examples: We're at a crucial juncture in our relationship.

definitions.definition: The manner of moving ( transition ) or mode of relationship between two consecutive sounds ; a suprasegmental phonemic cue , by which a listener can distinguish between two otherwise identical sequences of sounds that have different meanings.

main_definition: A place where things join , a junction .
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) The manner of moving ( transition ) or mode of relationship between two consecutive sounds ; a suprasegmental phonemic cue , by which a listener can distinguish between two otherwise identical sequences of sounds that have different meanings.
